RECORDS.title: 登陆失败
RECORDS.name: login_fail
RECORDS.log: 用户尝试使用账号：{$username}，密码：{$password} 登陆失败

RECORDS.title: 图片文件夹创建
RECORDS.name: image_folder_create
RECORDS.log: {:get_admin_info('username')} 在图片管理器创建了 {$title} 文件夹

RECORDS.title: 消息通知成功
RECORDS.name: notice_send_success
RECORDS.intro: {:get_admin_info('username')} 发送了 [id:{$id}]标题为"{$title}"类型为{:get_conf($type,'mission.notice')}的消息

RECORDS.title: 消息通知失败
RECORDS.name: notice_send_fail
RECORDS.log: {:get_admin_info('username')} 未能发送 [id:{$id}]标题为"{$title}"类型为{:get_conf($type,'mission.notice')}的消息
